name: Alolan Geodude

evolution.description: Alolan Geodude can evolve into Alolan Graveler at level 7 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 7 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Rock Pokémon. Its stone head is imbued with electricity and magnetism. If you carelessly step on one, you’ll be in for a painful shock.

abilities.name: Magnet Pull
abilities.description: Steel opponents in battle with this Pokémon may not switch out or flee.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: When taking damage equal to half or more of your current HP, roll a d4. On a result of 3 of 4, halve the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Galvanize
abilities.description: All of this Pokémon's normal-type moves are electric-type.
